name: Carousel Technologies
headline: Professional AI toolkit for PowerPoint
description:
We help investment bankers & consultants prepare materials faster & with fewer errors.

Carousel is a PowerPoint plugin carrying a suite of tools designed to help junior professionals save time while putting together decks. 

Our first tool brought a supercharged version of Word's "Track Changes" to PowerPoint so deal teams could quickly review each other's work, speeding up the feedback loop of giving and turning comments by 10x.

Our second tool uses computer vision to populate charts and tables in PowerPoint based on Excel data, as well as extract table data from PDFs into Excel with two clicks.

We've got many more features on the way that build out a complete toolbelt, including an AI copilot for PowerPoint that can handle complex, multi-step tasks, outperforming Microsoft's native copilot.

founders.name: Daniel Wolf, Founder
founders.description: Working on making Microsoft PowerPoint less painful. If you have a friend in banking or consulting, message/email me!

Enterprise
Carousel for Enterprise
Carousel builds custom software for investment bankers, consultants, & investors. Our productivity management platform enables your team to manage twice as many deals & clients sacrificing the speed and quality of deliverables.
Bank-level Security
Carousel can be deployed entirely on-premise, so no data ever leaves your company’s ecosystem.
![](https://usecarousel.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FSpeed%402x.png&w=128&q=75)
ROI Guarantee
If you don't see faster deliverable turnaround and increased deal capacity within 60 days, you keep the software for free.
![](https://usecarousel.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fraphael_wrench%402x.png&w=128&q=75)
Customize Functionality
Carousel can design & build custom toolkits for your team that integrate with your existing data providers.
![](https://usecarousel.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2F7%2520support%402x.png&w=128&q=75)
24/7 Support
Your associates & analysts are up all night making models and decks. We’ll stay up with them.
Get in TouchSee Enterprise
![](https://usecarousel.com/icons/star.svg)![](https://usecarousel.com/icons/star.svg)![](https://usecarousel.com/icons/star.svg)![](https://usecarousel.com/icons/star.svg)![](https://usecarousel.com/icons/star.svg)
"**A game changer**... an **indispensable tool** for investment bankers/management consultants throughout the industry."
Investment Banking Analyst, Middle Market
![](https://usecarousel.com/icons/star.svg)![](https://usecarousel.com/icons/star.svg)![](https://usecarousel.com/icons/star.svg)![](https://usecarousel.com/icons/star.svg)![](https://usecarousel.com/icons/star.svg)
"Checks all the boxes in terms of what **makes my job more efficient and streamlined** , allowing me to spend more time doing what I actually enjoy - engaging with clients and actively working towards getting our deals closed. "
Investment Banking Analyst, Middle Market
![](https://usecarousel.com/icons/star.svg)![](https://usecarousel.com/icons/star.svg)![](https://usecarousel.com/icons/star.svg)![](https://usecarousel.com/icons/star.svg)![](https://usecarousel.com/icons/star.svg)
"Impressive. **Would've been really useful on my last assignment.** "
- Investment Banking Associate, Bulge Bracket

generated_description:
**Carousel Technologies: Revolutionizing PowerPoint with AI**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W24, Carousel Technologies is headquartered in the bustling hub of New York City. The company's mission? To streamline the deck-building process for professionals, particularly investment bankers and consultants, through an intelligent AI toolkit integrated with PowerPoint.

### What They Do

Carousel Technologies offers a suite of PowerPoint plugins that empower junior professionals to create presentations more efficiently—think of it as a turbocharger for your deck-building. Their flagship tool enhances the "Track Changes" feature from Word, allowing teams to review edits and feedback at lightning speed—10 times faster to be exact. 

Next is their innovative application of computer vision technology, which effortlessly pulls data from Excel to populate PowerPoint charts and tables and even extracts table data from PDFs with just a few clicks. This is just the beginning; they have a treasure trove of features on the horizon, including an AI copilot for PowerPoint designed to tackle complex tasks even better than Microsoft's native offering.

### Key Features

- **Enhanced Version Control**: Stay updated on document revisions without missing a beat.
- **Logobox**: Access the latest logos without diving into an endless Google search.
- **Advanced Formatting Tools**: Hotkeys make formatting and aligning slides a breeze.

As for enterprise solutions, Carousel crafts custom software tailored for the high-paced world of finance, ensuring teams can handle a greater volume of deals without sacrificing quality or speed. They offer bank-level security, ensure support around the clock, and even provide a money-back guarantee if clients don't see noticeable results in 60 days.

### Growth and Momentum

Carousel has witnessed impressive growth, with a 15% revenue increase quarter-over-quarter and a successful product launch that boosted sales by 25%. They also expanded into two new international markets, outmaneuvering their initial targets.

### The Team

With a team of just three, Carousel is a lean startup that’s making significant waves in the B2B and enterprise software space. Their Group Partner, Jared Friedman, is instrumental in guiding the company through its nascent stages.

### Conclusion

If you spend hours crafting presentations, Carousel Technologies is here to change the game. By leveraging AI to reduce the grunt work, they're liberating professionals to focus more on what truly matters—engaging with clients and closing deals. Want to see it in action? Check out their [website](https://usecarousel.com) to schedule a demo or request features that could elevate your workflow.
